titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 with respect to treatment of certain equipment under the heavy truck tax.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1099-1100)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Select Revenue Measures.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/29/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt explosives handling equipment from the heavy truck tax.
